title: gapseqflow pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

subject_id.errorMessage: Subject ID must be provided and cannot contain spaces

sample_ids.errorMessage: Sample IDs must be provided and cannot contain commas

bin_id.errorMessage: Bin ID must be provided and cannot contain spaces

bin_fasta.errorMessage: Bin FASTA file must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fa' or '.fasta'

assembly.errorMessage: Assembly file must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fa', '.fasta', '.fa.gz', or '.fasta.gz'

fastq1.errorMessage: First FASTQ file must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq', '.fastq', '.fq.gz', or '.fastq.gz'

fastq2.errorMessage: Second FASTQ file must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq', '.fastq', '.fq.gz', or '.fastq.gz'

checkm_completeness.errorMessage: CheckM completeness must be a number between 0 and 100

checkm_contamination.errorMessage: CheckM contamination must be a number greater than or equal to 0
